author: Author

welcome.title: A new way to make Kazoo awesome is
welcome.encouragement: The 2600Hz marketplace helps you get the most of Kazoo. In addition, we are working hard to offer the best experience to discover and install applications in your cluster.

linkage.title: Connect your cluster to 2600Hz Marketplace
linkage.lead: In order to use applications from 2600Hz Marketplace, please follow these steps to connect your cluster to marketplace:
linkage.stepSingin: Please Sign In into your account
linkage.stepCopyCode: Copy the newly generated Access Code

edition.subtitle: Appex Client Configuration
edition.helpApiUrl: This URL will be used to serve UI app assets for marketplace applications.
edition.helpDangerDisable: Make Marketplace Connector to not run next time kazoo_appex or Kazoo nodes are restarted.
edition.helpDangerDisconnect: Disconnect your cluster from 2600Hz marketplace and cancel all apps.
edition.helpMore: To learn more about Marketplace Connector and these settings please see
edition.helpWarnDangerDisable: Your service might be disrupted if the Marketplace Connector is not running!
edition.helpWarnDangerDisconnect: Once you delete this Cluster connection, there is no going back. Your service will be disrupted!
edition.successUpdate: You successfully saved changes to configuration!

dangerDisconnectDialog.title: Confirmation of Disconnecting from Marketplace
dangerDisconnectDialog.messageIntro: This action CANNOT be undone. This will permanently disassociate your cluster from 2600Hz Marketplace and remove any apps or services purchased from marketplace.
dangerDisconnectDialog.messageExplanation: Please type the word "{{variable}}" in the following input and then click on the Disconnect button to proceed.

dangerDisableDialog.content: This will disable Marketplace connector. Next time your Kazoo node starts, the apps purchased through marketplace will not be started! Do not forget to update the list startup apps.

alerts.noUserSelected:
You must select at least one user for this app.

If you don't want any user to use this app, you can turn it off.

__comment: UI-1190: Updating the way apps are turned on/off
UI-1190: Updating the way apps are turned on/off
appStoreDisabled: It looks like the App Store has been disabled for this account. Contact your administrator for more information.
